pages.page:
I.3. The institution conducts leadership
training.
Pictures

ESTABLISHMENT OF LOCAL YOUTH DEVELOPMENT COUNCIL Local Youth Development Office, Tanza Cavite September 16, 2022
On September 16, 2022, President of the SK Federation Hon. Rhon Jay Perdito invited Local Youth Development Council (LYDC) members at Tanza Command Center for a Establishment Seminar led by THK head Mr. Justin Celeste. Student leaders from academic and non- academic organizations from Cavite State University-Tanza Cavite such as The Oracle Publication, Circle of Potential Educators, Radicals, Association of Compasionate Work Athlete, Anglicists Guild, Theatro Tanza of Phenomenal Students, and Central Student Government - Tanza Campus participated the aforementioned event.
The students leaders of CvSU-Tanza Campus with the SK Federation President, Hon. Rhon Jay Perdito.

LINGGO NG KABATAAN 2022 Governance and Active Citizenship Seminar Provincial Capitol, Trece Martires City Cavite August 31, 2022
In observance of Linggo ng Kabataan, the Provincial Government of Cavite through the Provincial Youth and Sports Development Office and in collaboration with College of Arts and Sciences Student Council - Cavite State University-Main and UTOPIA - CvSU Political Science Society conducted a seminar about Active Citizenship with the theme "The Role of Filipino Youth in Pursuing Accountability and Transparency Towards Good Governance" and Goverance with the theme "New Models in Politics: Empowering Youth Leaders Competencies Towards Civic Engagement Promoting Good Governance" for Caviteño Youth at the Cavite Collaboration Center for Public Health Auditorium, Trece Martires City, Cavite. Student leaders from CvSU-Tanza Campus joined the said activity.

Mr. Vincent Bae, Chairperson of the Cavite Provincial Youth and Sports Development Office giving his welcoming remarks to the participants.
Ms. Jan Angela L. Catindig, CSG President of CvSU-Tanza, during the seminar session
Student leaders of CvSU-Tanza Campus with other participants from different universities and colleges in Cavite

YOUTH SUMMIT LEADERSHIP TRAINING Provincial Gymnasium, Trece Martires City Cavite August 19, 2022
The Provincial Government of Cavite through the Provincial Youth and Sports Development Office conducted leadership training and team building activities for the registered youth and youth-serving organizations of Cavite at the Cavite Provincial Gymnasium, Trece Martires City, Cavite including all the registered student organizations of CvSU-Tanza Campus. The training proper began with a profound discussion of the topic, "Collaborative Leadership" by Ms. Nikki R. Jerusalem from the National Youth Commission. The training aims to develop the leadership skills of the participants and to build their camaraderie and friendship. Several organizations from Cavite State University including Central Student Government - Tanza Campus, Anglicists Guild , Radicals , Theatro Tanza of Phenomenal Students ,Circle of Potential Educators , Alliance of Bachelor of Elementary Education Students, and The Oracle - Cavite State University - Tanza Campus Publication attended the Cavite Youth and Youth - Serving Organization. Ms. Jan Angela Catindig, the CSG Vice President and Ms. Lorraine Victoria Encarnacion of The Oracle Publication was part of the core team and helped in facilitating the event.

Ms. Jan Angela Catindig (third from the left), CSG President of CvSU-Tanza Campus, and Ms. Lorraine Victoria Encarnacion, The Oracle President, (Third from the right), with the event core team
Student leaders from CvSU-Tanza Campus with other participants from different colleges and universities in Cavite during the teambuilding activity
Team building activities during the leadership seminar

LEADERSHIP TRAINING AND TEAM BUILDING Local Youth Development Office, Tanza Cavite July 2, 2022
SK Federation President Hon. Rhon Jay Perdito invited Local Youth Development Council (LYDC) members at Tanza Command Center for a Leadership Training and Team Building lead by Sir Justin Celeste. The Oracle Publication , Circle of Potential Educators, Radicals, Association of Compasionate Work Athlete, Anglicists Guild , Theatro Tanza of Phenomenal Students and to Central Student Government - Tanza Campus and CSG Vice President, Ms. Jan Angela Catindig, CSG Treasurer Ms. Kayla Rose Magpantay, and CSG Public Relations Officer, Ms. Jennelyn M. Valderama attended the leadership seminar.

CSG Officers with Mr. Justin Celeste from Tanza Command Center
Seminar lecture

CvSU-Tanza student leaders during the teambuilding activities
Prepared by:
FATIMA M. DIAZ SDS Coordinator
Noted:
MELONA I. SAQUIN Head, OSAS
